name: gonkys barn house
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 2 HOURS

LOCATION:

farm with a barn and looks of land and mysteries

MONSTER

gonky donky, he is a donky. he is a very scary entity who can move and fly through walls. his only weakness is his speed.

GAMEPLAY

its a sandbox game where you can run away from gonky. you can jump onto gonky and fly around to strange places like gonkys floating barn house and mars. there is lots of space to explore and there are lots of secrets.  there are leaves hidden across the map to find if you get too bored running away from gonky but, just because you are searching for the leaves, it doesn't mean gonky will show mercy.

MOVEMENT & CONTROLS

w a s d to move and shift to sprint and there is infinite stamina
